extends BaseMutation

      • DeleteMutation

        public DeleteMutation(Object key,
              String table,
              PersistenceController ctrl)
        Creates instance of delete mutation operation.
        Parameters:
        key - Ignite cache key of the object which should be deleted.
        table - Cassandra table which should be used for the mutation.
        ctrl - Persistence controller to use.
